summary: On the run from authorities, a sleazy courier poses as a Scout leader on a camping trip. But he has no idea what he's in for when he must actually take charge of a group of kids.
cast: Daniel Stern|Jon Polito|Brad Sullivan|Ann Dowd|Anthony Heald|Tom Wood|Blake Bashoff|Corey Carrier|Michael Galeota|Max Goldblatt|Ari Greenberg|Janna Michaels|Natalie West|Michael P. Byrne|Michael O'Neill|Jane Morris|Christopher Curry|Kenny Johnson|Robert Donley|Sue Kwon|Reed Clark Means|Harley Kelsey|Cesarina Vaughn|Cory Buck|Theodor Scott Owens|Mike Anderson|Paul Ben-Victor|Art Evans|Christy Oldenkamp|Carolyn Renee Smith
title: El gran scout
